7.speaker: Minsc

19.speaker: Minsc
19.text: Ignore them, Boo. Let them gaze deep into their own abyss, and wonder just what it is they are trying to achieve.

InternalNodeContext: Template CombatNodeContext: (Narrative Arc Start) Combat- Character is overwhelmed the player just spammed their portrait like crazy while in Combat
